Extensions/Collection.html#/s:Sl12MBurge.name: JSONtoString()

Classes/MBPluginsManager.html#/s:12MBurg.name: tagChanged(tag:value:)
Classes/MBPluginsManager.html#/s:12MBurg.abstract: Syncronize tag data coming from the plugins, this function is used by audience plugin to tell other plugins that a ttag has changed.

Classes/MBPluginsManager.html#/s:12MBurg.name: locationDataUpdated(latitude:longitude:)
Classes/MBPluginsManager.html#/s:12MBurg.abstract: Syncronize location data coming from the plugins, this function is used by audience plugin to tell other plugins that new data is available.

Classes/MBPluginsManager.html#/s:12MBurg.name: messagesReceived(messages:fromStartup:)
Classes/MBPluginsManager.html#/s:12MBurg.abstract: Used to pass messages from MBMessages & MBAutomation in order to display automation messages based on the triggers

Protocols/MBPlugin.html#/s:12MBurgerSwif.name: userKey
Protocols/MBPlugin.html#/s:12MBurgerSwif.abstract: The key used in the user dictionary, used to retrieve and set the data.

Protocols/MBPlugin.html#/s:12MBurgerSwif.name: object(forUserResponse:)
Protocols/MBPlugin.html#/s:12MBurgerSwif.abstract: Returns a object that will be inserted in the pluginsObjects property of the user.

Protocols/MBPlugin.html#/s:12MBurgerSwif.name: locationDataUpdated(latitude:longitude:)
Protocols/MBPlugin.html#/s:12MBurgerSwif.abstract: Function called by MBurger when new location data is available, used to synchronize audience location with automated messages

Protocols/MBPlugin.html#/s:12MBurgerSwif.name: tagChanged(tag:value:)
Protocols/MBPlugin.html#/s:12MBurgerSwif.abstract: Function called by MBAudience when a tatg changes, used to synchronize audience with automated messages

Protocols/MBPlugin.html#/s:12MBurgerSwif.name: messagesReceived(messages:fromStartup:)
Protocols/MBPlugin.html#/s:12MBurgerSwif.abstract: Function called by MBurger when messages are received, used to sync MBMessages with MBAutomation

Protocols/MBPlugin.html.name: MBPlugin
Protocols/MBPlugin.html.abstract: A plugin that can be attached to add more functionalities to MBurger.

Classes/MBPluginsManager.html.name: MBPluginsManager
Classes/MBPluginsManager.html.abstract: The main class that manages and synchronize MBurger plugins

Structs/MBLegalContract.html#/s:12MBurge.name: link
Structs/MBLegalContract.html#/s:12MBurge.abstract: The link of the contract, if setted.

Structs/MBLegalContract.html#/s:12MBurge.name: isActive
Structs/MBLegalContract.html#/s:12MBurge.abstract: If the contract is active or not.

Structs/MBPaginationInfo.html#/s:12MBurg.name: total
Structs/MBPaginationInfo.html#/s:12MBurg.abstract: The total number of elements of that type on MBurger.

Structs/MBPaginationInfo.html.name: MBPaginationInfo
Structs/MBPaginationInfo.html.abstract: This class contains meta information abaut the pagination, it’s usually returned when an array is requested by the api.

Structs/MBUserPublishedSection.html#/s:1.name: blockId
Structs/MBUserPublishedSection.html#/s:1.abstract: The id of the block of the section.

Structs/MBUserContractStatus.html#/s:12M.name: accepted
Structs/MBUserContractStatus.html#/s:12M.abstract: If the contract has been accepted or not.

Structs/MBUser.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: email
Structs/MBUser.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: The email of the user. It is unique for every user in your project.

Structs/MBUser.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: data
Structs/MBUser.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: Additional data if passed when the user is registered.

Structs/MBUser.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: pluginsObjects
Structs/MBUser.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: Dictionary of objects that can be used by the plugins to add data to the user.

Structs/MBUser.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: contracts
Structs/MBUser.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: An array of object representing the status of acceptance of the legal contracts of the project.

Structs/MBUser.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: publishedSections
Structs/MBUser.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: An array of object representing all the sections published by the user.

Classes/MBAuthContractAcceptanceParamete.name: accepted
Classes/MBAuthContractAcceptanceParamete.abstract: If the contract has been accepted or not.

Classes/MBAuthContractAcceptanceParamete.name: init(contractId:accepted:)
Classes/MBAuthContractAcceptanceParamete.abstract: Initializes the object with the contract id and the acceptance flag.

Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: authToken
Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: The access token that represents the user, if an user has been authenticated correctly.

Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: userIsLoggedIn
Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: Returns TRUE if a user is authenticated. This funcion check if the access token saved in the keychain is non-nil and different from an empty string.

Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: authenticateUser(withEmail:password:success:failure:)
Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: Authenticates a user giving the email and password

Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: authenticateUser(withSocialToken:tokenType:name:surname:contracts:success:failure:)
Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: Authenticates a user using the social token

Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: changePasswordForCurrentUser(withOldPassword:newPassword:success:failure:)
Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: Change the password for the current authenticated user

Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: forgotPassword(withEmail:success:failure:)
Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: Call this api if the user wants to reset its password. A mail will be sended to the user with a new password if a user with the given email is found in MBurger.

Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: getUserProfile(success:failure:)
Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: Retrieves the profile informations of the current authenticated user.

Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: updateProfile(withName:surname:phone:image:contracts:data:success:failure:)
Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: Updates the profile informations of the current authenticated user.

Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: deleteCurrentUser(success:failure:)
Structs/MBAuth.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: Deletes the current authenticated user. It will call the logoutCurrentUser if the deletion is succesful.

Classes/MBAuthContractAcceptanceParamete.name: MBAuthContractAcceptanceParameter
Classes/MBAuthContractAcceptanceParamete.abstract: A parameter that can be passed to the APIs that indicates if a legal contract has been accepted or not.

Structs/MBUserContractStatus.html.name: MBUserContractStatus
Structs/MBUserContractStatus.html.abstract: A struct indicating if a legal contract has been accepted by the user.

Enums/MBAuthSocialTokenType.html.name: MBAuthSocialTokenType
Enums/MBAuthSocialTokenType.html.abstract: The type of social tokens supported by MBurger

Protocols/MBDecodable.html.name: MBDecodable

Structs/MBFilterParameter.html#/s:12MBur.name: init(field:name:value:)

Structs/MBFilterParameter.html.abstract: A parameter used to filter the elements retuned.

Structs/MBGeneralParameter.html.name: MBGeneralParameter
Structs/MBGeneralParameter.html.abstract: A general parameter that can be sent to MBurger

Structs/MBSortParameter.html.name: MBSortParameter

Classes/MBMediaElement.html#/s:12MBurger.abstract: The first media of the element if exists.

Classes/MBFile.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.name: size
Classes/MBFile.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift6MB.abstract: The size of the media in byte.

Classes/MBImagesElement.html#/s:12MBurge.name: firstImage
Classes/MBImagesElement.html#/s:12MBurge.abstract: The first image of the element if exists.

Classes/MBImagesElement.html#/s:12MBurge.name: init(elementId:elementName:order:images:)

Classes/MBGeneralElement.html#/s:12MBurg.name: stringType
Classes/MBGeneralElement.html#/s:12MBurg.abstract: The type of the element retuned by the api.

Classes/MBTextElement.html#/s:12MBurgerS.name: init(elementId:elementName:order:text:)
Classes/MBTextElement.html#/s:12MBurgerS.abstract: Initializes a text element with the element id, name, type, order and text value.

Structs/MBElementFactory.html#/s:12MBurg.name: element(forDictionary:)
Structs/MBElementFactory.html#/s:12MBurg.abstract: Returns a MBElement object based on the type specified in the dictionary.

Classes/MBElement.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.name: init(elementId:elementName:type:order:)
Classes/MBElement.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.abstract: Initializes an element with an element id, name, type and order.

Protocols/MBElementProtocol.html.name: MBElementProtocol
Protocols/MBElementProtocol.html.abstract: A protocol to which all MBElements needs to be conform, it has all the basic data that a MBElement needs.

Classes/MBElement.html.name: MBElement
Classes/MBElement.html.abstract: This class represents the base class for all MBurger elements. All the specialized elements are subclasses of this class.

Structs/MBElementFactory.html.name: MBElementFactory
Structs/MBElementFactory.html.abstract: This struct is used to create a MBElement objects based on the API’s response

Classes/MBTextElement.html.name: MBTextElement
Classes/MBTextElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger text element.

Classes/MBDropdownElement.html.name: MBDropdownElement
Classes/MBDropdownElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger dropdown element.

Classes/MBDropdownElementOption.html.name: MBDropdownElementOption
Classes/MBDropdownElementOption.html.abstract: This class represents an option that can be selected in a dropdown.

Classes/MBPollElement.html.name: MBPollElement
Classes/MBPollElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger poll element, the property answers contains the answers the user can give to a the poll.

Classes/MBMarkdownElement.html.name: MBMarkdownElement
Classes/MBMarkdownElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger markdown element.

Classes/MBGeneralElement.html.name: MBGeneralElement
Classes/MBGeneralElement.html.abstract: This class represents a general MBurger element.

Classes/MBAddressElement.html.name: MBAddressElement
Classes/MBAddressElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger address element.

Classes/MBDateElement.html.name: MBDateElement
Classes/MBDateElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger date element.

Classes/MBImagesElement.html.name: MBImagesElement
Classes/MBImagesElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger images element.

Classes/MBMediaElement.html.name: MBMediaElement
Classes/MBMediaElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger media element.

Classes/MBCheckboxElement.html.name: MBCheckboxElement
Classes/MBCheckboxElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger checkbox element.

Classes/MBRelationElement.html.name: MBRelationElement
Classes/MBRelationElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger relation element.

Classes/MBRelation.html.name: MBRelation
Classes/MBRelation.html.abstract: This class represents a relation in an MBurger relation element.

Classes/MBColorElement.html.name: MBColorElement
Classes/MBColorElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger color element.

Classes/MBMultipleElement.html.name: MBMultipleElement
Classes/MBMultipleElement.html.abstract: This class represents a MBurger multiple element, users can select multiple values from an array of options.

Classes/MBMultipleElementOption.html.name: MBMultipleElementOption
Classes/MBMultipleElementOption.html.abstract: This class represents an option that can be selected in a multiple element.

Classes/MBApiManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSw.name: request(withToken:locale:apiName:method:headers:parameters:development:encoding:success:failure:)
Classes/MBApiManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSw.abstract: Calls the api to the MBurger endpoint with the parameters specified. At the end of the network call it will be called the success block or the failure block.

Classes/MBApiManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSw.name: upload(withToken:locale:apiName:method:headers:multipartParameters:development:completion:)
Classes/MBApiManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSw.abstract: Calls the api to the MBurger endpoint with the parameters specified. At the end of the network call it will be called the success block or the failure block. This is used to upload elements to MBurger.

Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.name: apiToken
Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.abstract: The API token used to make all the requests to the api.

Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.name: development
Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.abstract: It’s true if it’s in development mode.

Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.name: plugins
Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.abstract: An array of plugin objects that can add functionality to the core MBurger.

Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.name: locale
Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.abstract: The locale used to make the requests.

Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.name: localeString
Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.abstract: The locale string sended to the api.

Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.name: applicationDidFinishLaunchingWithOptions(launchOptions:)
Classes/MBManager.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.abstract: Tells to MBurger and plugins that the app has started, used to do some startup work for audience and automation plugins.

Classes/MBApiManager.html.name: MBApiManager
Classes/MBApiManager.html.abstract: This class is responsible to make all the networking requests to the MBurger Api, MBManager, MBClient and MBAdmin are built above this class.

Classes/MBClient.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift8.name: getBlock(withId:parameters:includeSections:includeElements:success:failure:)
Classes/MBClient.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift8.abstract: Retrieve the block of the project with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift8.name: getSections(ofBlock:parameters:elements:success:failure:)
Classes/MBClient.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift8.abstract: Retrieve the sections of the block with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift8.name: getSection(withId:parameters:elements:success:failure:)
Classes/MBClient.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift8.abstract: Retrieve the section with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift8.name: getElements(ofSection:success:failure:)
Classes/MBClient.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift8.abstract: Retrieve the elements of the section with the specified id.

Classes/MBClient.html.name: MBClient
Classes/MBClient.html.abstract: The main client of the SDK, this is your entry point for all the calls you do with MBurger.

Classes/MBSection.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.name: elements
Classes/MBSection.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.abstract: The elements of the section. The key of the dictionary is the name of the element, the value is an instance of a MBElement that represents the object.

Classes/MBSection.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.name: inEvidence
Classes/MBSection.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.abstract: Indicates if the section is in evidence.

Classes/MBSection.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.name: init(sectionId:order:elements:availableAt:inEvidence:)
Classes/MBSection.html#/s:12MBurgerSwift.abstract: Initializes the section object with the section id, order, the elements(if present), the availability date and if is in evidence or not.
